searchDocs.title: Properties
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: $target‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	HTMLElement  Element on which datepicker was initialized.

searchDocs.title: $input‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	HTMLInputElement  Datepicker input element

searchDocs.title: $datepicker‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	HTMLDivElement  Datepicker calendar element

searchDocs.title: currentView‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	'years' | 'months' | 'days'  Current view of calendar

searchDocs.title: viewDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date  Current view date

searchDocs.title: selectedDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date | null  Selected date of calendar, if not selected returns null

searchDocs.title: focusDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date | null  Focus date of calendar, if not focused returns null

searchDocs.title: converter‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Converter  Converter instance for convert date to datepicker's locale format

searchDocs.title: Getting Started
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Install the package‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Snow DatePicker is avaialbe as snow-datepicker npm package.  npmYarnpnpm npm install snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Usage‚Äã
searchDocs.content: import SnowDatePicker from 'snow-datepicker'; import 'snow-datepicker/snow-datepicker.css'; new SnowDatePicker('#element'[, options]);

searchDocs.title: Without package manager‚Äã
searchDocs.content: If you don't want ot use package manager, you can add Javascript at the end of <body>  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/snow-datepicker/snow-datepicker.min.js"></script> <script> new SnowDatePicker('#element'[, options]); </script>

searchDocs.title: Download‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Download the latest version of Snow DatePicker at https://www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/snow-datepicker  Check the releases and source code of Snow DatePicker at https://github.com/janghye0k/snow-datepicker/releases

searchDocs.title: Options
searchDocs.content: Options üìÑÔ∏è Setup Options These options are the properties that can be passed to the datepicker to customize its behavior. üìÑÔ∏è Localization Snow DatePicker supports localization. You can change the language of the calendar by passing the locale object to the locale option. The available localizations are located in the 'locales/' directory. üìÑÔ∏è Events onChangeView
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: API
searchDocs.content: API You can access the Snow Datepicker API through the instance of the datepicker. The instance is returned when you create a new datepicker: const datepicker = new SnowDatepicker('#picker'); datepicker.currentView; // 'days' datepicker.show(); üìÑÔ∏è Properties $target üìÑÔ∏è Methods setCurrentView üìÑÔ∏è Converter Converter instance for convert date to datepicker's locale format
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Converter
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: format‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Convert date to given format string.  (value: any, format: string) => string;   value - The date to format. If date value is not valid, function will return given format.format - The format string to convert. (e.g. YYYY-MM-DD). dateFormat options can be used.  Get the formatted date according to the string.  If you want to pass escape characters, you can use square brackets to wrap the text. (e.g. YYYY [escaped text] MM will output 2024 escaped text 01)  YY 2-digit yearYY1 2-digit year of the first year in current decadeYY2 2-digit year of the last year in current decadeYYYY full yearYYYY1 full year of the first year in current decadeYYYY2 full year of the last year in current decadeM monthMM month with leading zeroMMM short month nameMMMM full month nameD dayDD day with leading zerod weekday indexdd min weekday nameddd short weekday namedddd full weekday name

searchDocs.title: time‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Convert date to time format string.  (value: any) => string;   value - The date to format.

searchDocs.title: date‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Convert date to date format string.  (value: any) => string;   value - The date to format.

searchDocs.title: localeMonth‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Convert month index to locale month name.  (monthindex: number, short?: boolean) => string;   monthindex - The month index to convert.short - If true, short month name will be returned.

searchDocs.title: localeWeekday‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Convert weekday index to locale weekday name.  (weekdayindex: number, options?: 'short' | 'min') => string;   weekdayindex - The weekday index to convert.options - If short, short weekday name will be returned. If min, min weekday name will be returned.

searchDocs.title: Basic Examples
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Default options‚Äã
searchDocs.content: new SnowDatePicker('#element');

searchDocs.title: Inline calendar‚Äã
searchDocs.content: If you want to display the calendar always visible, you can set the inline option to true.      new SnowDatePicker('#element', { inline: true });

searchDocs.title: With default selected date‚Äã
searchDocs.content: You can set the default selected date by passing value to the selectedDate option.        new SnowDatePicker('#element', { selectedDate: new Date() });

searchDocs.title: Month/Year Picker‚Äã
searchDocs.content: You can enable the month/year picker by setting the minView option to months | years.  Month PickerYear Picker new SnowDatePicker('#element', { minView: 'months' });

searchDocs.title: Localization
searchDocs.content: Localization Snow DatePicker supports localization. You can change the language of the calendar by passing the locale object to the locale option. The available localizations are located in the 'locales/' directory. Example of localization object‚Äã export default { name: 'en', weekdays: [ 'Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', ], months: [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December', ], weekStart: 1, weekdaysShort: ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'], monthsShort: [ 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec', ], weekdaysMin: ['Su', 'Mo', 'Tu', 'We', 'Th', 'Fr', 'Sa'], formats: { time: 'HH:mm', date: 'DD/MM/YYYY' }, placeholder: 'Choose date', };
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Methods
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: setCurrentView‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Set current view of datepicker  (value: 'years' | 'months' | 'days') => void   value - The view to change. (e.g. days | months | years)

searchDocs.title: setViewDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Set view date of datepicker  (value: DateLike) => void   value - The view date to change.

searchDocs.title: setSelectedDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Set selected date of datepicker  (value: any) => void   value - The date to select, If date value is not valid, it will be set to null  setSelectedDate(new Date(2024, 01, 01, 12)); // Thu Feb 01 2024 12:00:00 setSelectedDate('invalid'); // null

searchDocs.title: setFocusDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Set focus date of datepicker  (value: any) => void   value - The value to change

searchDocs.title: next‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Move to next month | years | decade

searchDocs.title: next‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Move to previous month | years | decade

searchDocs.title: hide‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Hide calendar

searchDocs.title: show‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Show calendar

searchDocs.title: setTheme‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Set datepicker theme mode  (theme: 'light' | 'dark') => void   theme - The theme to change

searchDocs.title: setSize‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Set focus date of datepicker  (size: 'small' | 'normal') => void   size - The size to change

searchDocs.title: isSameDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Check arguments date is same date in given view.  (date: Date, compare: Date, view?: `days` | `months` | `years`) => boolean;   date - The value to check compare - The value to compare view - The view state to use for comparison. Returns the value and compare in the same view  isSameDate(new Date('2024-01-01'), new Date('2024-01-30')); // false isSameDate(new Date('2024-01-01'), new Date('2024-01-30'), 'months'); // true

searchDocs.title: isShow‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Get datepicker calendar visible state. If calendar is visible, returns true, otherwise false.  () => boolean;

searchDocs.title: on/off‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Add/Remove event listener to datepicker instance  (eventName: string, listener: Function) => void   eventName - The event name to listen. (e.g. select, changeView) listener - The listener function. Detail of event is here. Events

searchDocs.title: destroy‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Destroy datepicker instance

searchDocs.title: Buttons
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Pre defined buttons‚Äã
searchDocs.content: new SnowDatePicker('#element', { buttons: ['today', 'clear'] });

searchDocs.title: Custom buttons‚Äã
searchDocs.content: You can add custom buttons by passing an object.        new SnowDatePicker('#element', { buttons: [ { innerHTML: 'First Day', onClick: (event, datepicker) => { datepicker.setSelectedDate( new Date((datepicker.currentDate || new Date()).getFullYear(), 0, 1) ); }, }, 'clear', ], });

searchDocs.title: Setup Options
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: className‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	string  Add custom classes.

searchDocs.title: dateFormat‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	string	Default	YYYY-MM-DD  Get the formatted date according to the string passed in.  If you want to pass escape characters, you can use square brackets to wrap the text. (e.g. YYYY [escaped text] MM will output 2024 escaped text 01)  YY - 2-digit yearYY1 - 2-digit year of the first year in current decadeYY2 - 2-digit year of the last year in current decadeYYYY - full yearYYYY1 - full year of the first year in current decadeYYYY2 - full year of the last year in current decadeM - monthMM - month with leading zeroMMM - short month nameMMMM - full month nameD - dayDD - day with leading zerod - weekday indexdd - min weekday nameddd - short weekday namedddd - full weekday name

searchDocs.title: locale‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Locale  Language of the calendar. By default, english language is used.  interface Locale { name: string; months: string[]; monthsShort: string[]; weekStart?: number; weekdays: string[]; weekdaysShort: string[]; weekdaysMin: string[]; formats: { time: string; date: string }; placeholder?: string; }

searchDocs.title: inline‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	false  Makes the calendar to be permanently visible.

searchDocs.title: selectedDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date  The active date.

searchDocs.title: minDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date  The minimum date of calendar, Can't be set to less than 0100-01-01

searchDocs.title: maxDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date  The maximum date of calendar, Can't be set to more than 9999-12-31

searchDocs.title: view‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date	Default	days  The initial view of the calendar. (e.g. days | months | years)

searchDocs.title: minView‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	Date	Default	days  The minimum view of the calendar. The values are same as view.

searchDocs.title: showOtherMonths‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  If true, dates from other months will be displayed in days view.

searchDocs.title: selectOtherMonths‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  If true, it will be possible to select dates from other months.

searchDocs.title: moveOtherMonths‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  If true , then selecting dates from another month will be causing transition to this month.

searchDocs.title: shortcuts‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  Enables keyboard navigation.  Move cell focus.  Command	Description‚Üë ‚Üì ‚Üê ‚Üí	Move cell focus. Ctrl + ‚Üí or ‚Üì	Move to the next month Ctrl + ‚Üê or ‚Üë	Move to the previous month Shift + ‚Üí or ‚Üì	Move to the next month Shift + ‚Üê or ‚Üë	Move to the previous month Alt + ‚Üí or ‚Üì	Move to the next month Alt + ‚Üê or ‚Üë	Move to the previous month

searchDocs.title: navigationLoop‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  Whether to enable navigation when the maximum/minimum date is exceeded.

searchDocs.title: autoClose‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  If true, the calendar will be hidden after selecting the date.

searchDocs.title: toggleSelected‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  If true, then clicking on the active cell will remove the selection from it.

searchDocs.title: titleFormat‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	TitleFormat	Default	{ days: 'MMMM, <i>YYYY</i>', months: 'YYYY', years: 'YYYY1 - YYYY2' }  Title templates in the calendar navigation.  interface TitleFormat { days: string; months: string; years: string; }

searchDocs.title: position‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	string	Default	bottom-start  Position of the calendar relative to the input field.  top | top-start | top-endbottom | bottom-start | bottom-endright | right-start | right-endleft | left-start | left-end

searchDocs.title: animation‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	true  If true, the calendar will open & close with animation.

searchDocs.title: backdrop‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	false  If true, calendar apper with backdrop

searchDocs.title: readOnly‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	boolean	Default	false  If true, it will not be able to edit dates at input field.

searchDocs.title: placeHolder‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	string  Datepicker placeholder

searchDocs.title: theme‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	light | dark	Default	light  If, dark, datepicker's color scheme set to dark mode

searchDocs.title: size‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	small | normal	Default	normal  The size of datepicker input.

searchDocs.title: buttons‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Type	ButtonPresetType | ButtonPresetType[] | ButtonOptions | ButtonOptions[]  Add action buttons to the calendar. You could add two pre defined buttons or custom buttons.  ButtonPresetType‚Äã  clear: add "Clear" button. Clear the selected datetoday: add "Today" button. Set the selected date to today  ButtonOptions‚Äã  interface ButtonPresetOptions { id?: string; // button id className?: string; // button class dataset?: Record<string, string>; // button data attributes attrs?: Record<string, string>; // button attributes innerHTML?: string; // button inner html onClick?: (event: MouseEvent, datepicker: SnowDatePicker) => any; // button click event } ```import { escape } from 'core-js/fn/regexp';

searchDocs.title: Format
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Date format‚Äã
searchDocs.content: You can customize the date format by setting the dateFormat option.        new SnowDatePicker('#element', { dateFormat: 'YY % MM % DD' });

searchDocs.title: Title format‚Äã
searchDocs.content: new SnowDatePicker('#element', { titleFormat: { days: '[<b>]YYYY[</b>] MM', months: 'YY' }, inline: true, });

searchDocs.title: Events
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: onChangeView‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a changeView event when the user change the view (days, months, years) of the calendar.  ({ view, prevView, datepicker }: PickerViewEvent) => void   view - The current view of the calendar.prevView - The previous view of the calendar.datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onChangeViewDate‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a changeViewDate event when the user change the view date of the calendar.  ({ date, prevDate, datepicker }: PickerDateEvent) => void   date - The current view date of the calendar.prevDate - The previous view date of the calendar.datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onSelect‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a select event when the user select a date.  ({ date, prevDate, datepicker }: PickerDateEvent) => void   date - The selected date.prevDate - The previous selected date. It can be null or undefined if there was no selected date.datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onBeforeSelect‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a beforeSelect event before the user select a date.  If the event handler returns false, the date will not be selected.  ({ date, prevDate, datepicker }: PickerCellEvent) => boolean | void   date - The selected date.prevDate - The previous selected date. It can be null or undefined if there was no selected date.datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onClickCell‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An element receives a clickCell event when the user clicks on a cell.  ({ type, date, $element, nativeEvent, datepicker }: PickerCellEvent) => void   type - The type of the cell. It can be day, month, or year.date - The date of the cell.$element - The cell element.nativeEvent - The native event object.datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onRenderCell‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a renderCell event when the cell is rendered.  ({ type, date, $element, datepicker }: PickerCellEvent) => void   type - The type of the cell. It can be day, month, or year.date - The date of the cell.$element - The cell element.datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onFocus‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a focus event when the calendar cell is focused.  ({ type, date, $element, datepicker }: PickerCellEvent) => void   type - The type of the cell. It can be day, month, or year.date - The date of the cell.$element - The cell element.datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onShow‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a show event when the calendar is shown. If inline option is enabled, the event does not fire.  ({ datepicker }: PickerEvent) => void   datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: onHide‚Äã
searchDocs.content: An instance receives a hide event when the calendar is hidden. If inline option is enabled, the event does not fire.  ({ datepicker }: PickerEvent) => void   datepicker - The datepicker instance.

searchDocs.title: Localization
searchDocs.keywords: pure  datepicker  javascript  vanilla  date  picker  snow  snow-datepicker

searchDocs.title: Use predefined locales‚Äã
searchDocs.content: Snow DatePicker provides predefined locales for the following languages:locale.json        import SnowDatePicker from 'snow-datepicker'; import localeKo from 'snow-datepicker/locale/ko'; new SnowDatePicker('#element', { locale: localeKo, inline: true });

searchDocs.title: Customize locales‚Äã
searchDocs.content: You can customize the locale by passing an object to the locale option.  Detail of the locale object is described in the localization section.        const locale = { name: 'en', weekdays: [ 'Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', ], months: [ 'month1', 'month2', 'month3', 'month4', 'month5', 'month6', 'month7', 'month8', 'month9', 'month10', 'month11', 'month12', ], weekStart: 1, weekdaysShort: ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'], monthsShort: [ 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec', ], weekdaysMin: ['üåû', '‚òï', 'üòµ', 'üëßüèª', 'ü™ê', 'üéÖ', 'üëª'], formats: { time: 'HH:mm', date: 'DD/MM/YYYY' }, placeholder: 'Choose date', }; new SnowDatePicker('#element', { locale, inline: true });
